channel.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
channel.description: how do i assign administrators and mods? what is the code and where do i put it? thank you!

item.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

do you even hae a souce? if yes, then did u extract it to desktop? if yes then just go to the folder and look for charcter folder, go in it and look for the player name you are looking for. double click it, change player right from 0 to 1 which is mod or 2 wich is admin or 3 which is admin and owner… if that doesnt work, then other sources has this, go to data look for adminstrator add there name and save. if u dont have your own server, add yousif_shawkat92@yhaoo.com on yahoo or msn i’lll help u.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i assign administrators and mods?

item.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

open up your server’s folder, then look for the data folder, open it and look for administrators.txt open that and type in the name of the player you want to become an admin. do the same for mods but instead of it being administrators.txt it’s moderators.txt

Read full topic

item.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Opn ur char file find the username u want admin find player-rights set it to 0 1 to or 3

0 - normal
1 - modorater
2 - admin
3 - admin ( owner )

item.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

  1. Open the ‘Character’ folder
  2. Double-click on they’re file (has they’re name under it)
  3. It should start out saying something like this.

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = rusty burger
character-password = 216-87-142-223-132-88-206-6-251-197-187-118-165-140-92-92-140

[CHARACTER]
character-height = -1
character-posx = 2712
character-posy = 9564
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 5.179.60.170
character-lastlogin = 20070519
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 4003[/code]

  1. Where it says
character-rights = 0

Change the 0 to… If you notice the post above, rune pur3 posted what to change it to.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i assign administrators and mods?
item.dc:creator: @The_rune_pur3 The rune pur3
item.description:
@The_rune_pur3 wrote:

Go to the players file and change their rights to whatever you want
0=normal player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
Hope this helps
